lexa.core.expression

Class Negative

  • java.lang.Object
    • lexa.core.expression.Expression
      • lexa.core.expression.Negative

  • public class Negative
extends Expression
    A negative expression.
    This class simply returns the negative value of the base expression.
    Since:
    2013-03
    Author:
    William
